hero.title: Complete care for your furry family
hero.subtitle: From grooming to dog walking to pet sitting - we provide all the care your pets need. Trusted, insured, and passionate about keeping tails wagging. One-stop pet care you can count on.

about.title: Your Pet Care Partners
about.subtitle: Trusted by pet parents since 2015
about.content: Pawfect Care offers comprehensive pet services so you have one trusted provider for all your pet's needs. Our team is insured, bonded, and certified in pet first aid. We treat every pet like our own.

products.name: Full Grooming
products.description: Complete grooming including bath, haircut, nail trim, ear cleaning. For dogs and cats. Premium products.

products.name: Dog Walking
products.description: 30-minute neighborhood walk. Perfect for busy days. GPS tracking included. Single or pack walks available.

products.name: Pet Sitting (Overnight)
products.description: Overnight care in your home. Feeding, walks, playtime, and company. Stay-at-home pet care.

products.name: Drop-In Visits
products.description: 30-minute home visit for feeding, walks, litter box cleaning. Perfect for cats or quick check-ins.

products.name: Doggy Daycare
products.description: Full day of supervised play and socialization. Exercise and mental stimulation. Pick-up and drop-off available.

products.name: Monthly Care Package
products.description: 4 walks + 1 grooming + 2 drop-in visits per month. Best value for regular pet care needs.
